mapper.insert: INSERT INTO f_light ( lmac, lname, mid, create_date, update_date,pid ,product_id,gid) values (#{lmac},#{lname},#{mid},now(),now() ,#{pid},#{productId}, (select id from f_group where group_id=#{groupId} and mid=#{mid}))
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM f_light_setting WHERE lid=(select id from f_light WHERE lmac=#{lmac})

mapper.select: select lmac,lname,product_id from f_light WHERE mid=#{mid}
mapper.update: UPDATE f_light SET gid=#{gid},update_date=now(),pid=#{pid} WHERE lmac=#{lmac}

mapper.select: select count(*) from f_light_adjust where lid=(select id from f_light where lmac=#{lmac})
